restartWarningDialog.title: Yeniden Başlatma Gerekli
restartWarningDialog.description: Yeniden başlattıktan sonra, açılan gizli pencereler ve gizli sekmeler kaybolacaktır.

home.description: {{productName}} deneyiminizi geliştirmek için hesabınızı, gizliliğinizi ve güvenliğinizi yönetin.

setup.title: Kurulum
setup.setupDescription: {{productName}} deneyiminizi en üst düzeye çıkarmak için kurulumu tamamlayın.

privacyAndTrackingProtection.title: Gizlilik ve İzleme Koruması
privacyAndTrackingProtection.description: {{productName}} varsayılan olarak verilerinizi ve gizliliğinizi korur, ancak bu ayarları manuel olarak da değiştirebilirsiniz.

ablazeAccount.title: Ablaze Hesabı (Çok Yakında)
ablazeAccount.description: Bazı verileri diğer cihazlarla senkronize etmek için bir Mozilla Hesabı kullanın. Ablaze Hesabı, Mozilla Hesabı ile senkronize edilemeyen verileri senkronize eder.

manageExtensions.title: Eklentileri yönet
manageExtensions.description: {{productName}} addons.mozilla.org adresinde bulunan eklentileri yönetmenizi sağlar.

browserSupport.title: {{productName}} Destek
browserSupport.description: {{productName}} katılımcıları tarafından yazılmış destek belgelerine erişin.

design.customizePositionOfToolbars: Araç çubuğu konumlarını, sekme çubuğu stilini ve {{productName}}'un görünümünü kişiselleştirin.
design.useFaviconColorToBackgroundOfNavigationB: Gezinti Çubuğu Arka Planı için Favicon Rengini Kullan
design.verticalTabIsRemovedFromBrowser: Dikey Sekmeler {{productName}}adresinden kaldırılmıştır. Lütfen bunun yerine Firefox'un yerel Dikey Sekme Çubuğunu kullanın.
design.hideTabBarAndTitleBar: Sekme Çubuğunu ve Başlık Çubuğunu Gizle
design.showTabBarOnBottomOfNavigationBar: Gezinti Çubuğunun Altında Sekme Çubuğunu Göster

tab.title: Sekmeler
tab.scrollDescription: Choose whether to use scrolling for tab switching and select scrolling behavior.
tab.scrollPrefInfo: "{{reverseScrollPrefName}}" & "{{scrollWrapPrefName}}" will only work if "{{scrollPrefName}}" is enabled.
tab.openPositionDescription: Yeni sekmelerin nerede açılacağını belirleyin. Firefox'un davranışını takip etmek, bağlantıları nasıl açtığınıza bağlı olarak konumu değiştirecektir.
tab.minWidthError: Sekme genişliği {{min}} ile {{max}} piksel arasında olmalıdır.
tab.minHeightError: Sekme yüksekliği {{min}} ile {{max}} piksel arasında olmalıdır.

uiCustomization.title: UI Kişiselleştirme
uiCustomization.needRestartDescriptionForEnableAndDisabl: Bu kullanıcı UI kişiselleştirme özelliğini tamamen etkinleştirmek veya devre dışı bırakmak için {{productName}}'un yeniden başlatılması gerekir.

multirowTab.title: Multirow Tab
multirowTab.newtabInsideEnabled: Show new tab button inside tab bar

workspaces.howToUseAndCustomize: How to use and customize workspaces
workspaces.workspacesDescription: Workspaces greatly simplify the process of grouping tabs, making it easier to organize and manage your tabs.
workspaces.needRestartDescriptionForEnableAndDisabl: A restart of {{productName}} is required to completely enable or disable the workspace feature.
workspaces.enableWorkspacesDescription: Workspaces won't function even if this setting is enabled unless the workspace button is placed on the toolbar. Use this setting if you want to completely disable workspaces.
workspaces.closePopupWhenSelectingWorkspace: Close workspace popup when selecting a workspace
workspaces.closePopupWhenSelectingWorkspaceDescript: Choose whether to close the workspace popup when selecting a workspace.
workspaces.showWorkspaceNameOnToolbar: Show workspace name next to the icon
workspaces.manageOnBmsDescription: When this feature is enabled, you can only manage workspaces on the {{productName}} sidebar. You won't be able to manage workspaces using the toolbar button.

accounts.profileDescription: Profiles contain browsing-related information such as history, bookmarks, settings, and add-ons. Floorp uses this profile to save data.
accounts.profileManagementDescription: Profiles can be created and separated from each other, and their data is stored in the profile folder.
accounts.syncFloorpNotesToMozillaAccount: Floorp Notlar'ı Mozilla Hesabı İle Senkronize Et(Deneysel)
accounts.notSynced: Log in to Mozilla Account to enable sync feature

about.browserDescription: {{productName}} is a browser developed in Japan. It's built on Firefox under Ablaze to improve the web.
about.openSourceLicense: {{productName}} is open-source software available under the Mozilla Public License 2.0, made possible by the Firefox open-source project and other open-source software.

search.title: Search Settings
search.searchResultsDescription: Search results for "{{query}}". Only {{productName}} settings are searched; Firefox settings are not included.

panelSidebar.title: Panel Sidebar
panelSidebar.description: Panel Sidebar is a feature that allows you to display various tools, websites, and extensions on the side of the window. Here, you can customize, add, delete, and manage panels.
panelSidebar.howToUseAndCustomize: How to use and customize Panel Sidebar
panelSidebar.enableDescription: Panel Sidebar is different from Firefox's sidebar and won't interfere with it. Panel Sidebar can display web pages, unlike Firefox's sidebar. You can also manage workspaces in the sidebar.
panelSidebar.globalWidthDescription: Global width is applied when panel width is set to 0.
panelSidebar.iconProviderRemoved: The icon provider setting has been removed as {{productName}} now tries to get panel icons directly from web pages when possible.
panelSidebar.needRestartDescriptionForEnableAndDisabl: {{productName}}'s restart is required to completely enable or disable the panel sidebar feature.
panelSidebar.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this panel?

errors.urlRequired: URL is required for web panels
errors.extensionIdRequired: Extension ID is required for extension panels
errors.invalidWidth: Width must be at least 100 pixels

progressiveWebApp.title: Web Apps
progressiveWebApp.description: Manage your installed Web Apps and their settings
progressiveWebApp.enablePwaDescription: Allow websites to be installed as desktop apps
progressiveWebApp.needRestartDescriptionForEnableAndDisabl: {{productName}}'s restart is required to completely enable or disable the progressive web app feature.
progressiveWebApp.showToolbarDescription: Display the toolbar in Progressive Web App windows
progressiveWebApp.uninstallWarning: Are you sure you want to uninstall "{{name}}"?

mouseGesture.description: Control your browser with mouse movements.
mouseGesture.name: Name

keyboardShortcut.description: Customize keyboard shortcuts for various browser actions.
keyboardShortcut.enableDescription: When enabled, you can customize keyboard shortcuts for various browser actions. When disabled, default Firefox shortcuts will be used.
keyboardShortcut.needRestartDescription: A restart of {{productName}} is required to completely enable or disable the custom keyboard shortcuts feature.
keyboardShortcut.shortcutsDescription: Configure keyboard shortcuts for various browser actions
keyboardShortcut.shortcutsTip: Some shortcuts may conflict with Firefox's default shortcuts.
keyboardShortcut.keyConflict: This shortcut is already in use
keyboardShortcut.keyConflictDescription: Please choose a different shortcut or remove the existing one first.
keyboardShortcut.noModifierDescription: Please select at least one modifier key.

modal.title: Edit Shortcut
modal.description: Enter the key you want to use and select the modifier keys to combine them.
